name: Arcade Pong: Classics and More
description:
Remember the older Editions of the Classic Game Pong? Well RainbowKappa789 and his team are trying to remake it for Computer Platforms but with Extra Features such as Challenges with Online Leaderboards so you can face with others to be the best! Have Fun and Pong on!

- Update Log -

v0.1 - First Ever Build Available to Public.

v0.2 - Added Leaderboard without Functionality. Removed Options.

Update 12/23/2016 - All Classic Games from RainbowKappa789 will be free except School Simulator X's Review Copy. :P Enjoy the fact We're back!
